channel.title: Staff clan chat [pi]
channel.description:
hey guys, i am wonting to make a certain clan chat only avaliable to staff members i searched the message i get when entering a clan and it brought me to clanchathanlder.
i tryed adding this command into [code] public void addToClan(int playerId, int clanId) { [/code] but i got errors
[code] } else if (clans[clanId].contains("staffchat") && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("You cannont join this clan chat."); return; [/code] if anyone has a way of doing this please help.
edit: now i only get these two errors on the compiler [code] src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:101: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler } else if (clans[clanId].name.contains("staffchat") && c.pl ayerRights >= 0) { ^ src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:102: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler c.sendMessage("You cannont join this clan chat."); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Staff clan chat [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey guys,
i am wonting to make a certain clan chat only avaliable to staff members
i searched the message i get when entering a clan and it brought me to clanchathanlder.

i tryed adding this command into

public void addToClan(int playerId, int clanId) {

but i got errors

} else if (clans[clanId].contains("staffchat") && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("You cannont join this clan chat."); return;
if anyone has a way of doing this please help.

edit: now i only get these two errors on the compiler

src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:101: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler } else if (clans[clanId].name.contains("staffchat") && c.pl ayerRights >= 0) { ^ src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:102: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler c.sendMessage("You cannont join this clan chat."); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
